functions.tag: {CustomModelData:149,CustomAttributes:1b,display:{Name:'{"translate":"聖なるポテト","color":"#FFFE51","bold":true,"italic":false}',Lore:['[{"text":"❖ ","color":"","italic":false},{"translate":"%1$s%2$s(II)","color":"white","with":[{"translate":"闇の"},{"translate":"刻印"}]}]','{"translate":"ポテト教団の謳う聖なるポテト。","color":"#AFAFAF","italic":false}','{"translate":"その昔、とある大地が枯れ果て飢餓が蔓延した。","color":"#AFAFAF","italic":false}','{"translate":"それを憂いた聖人が一夜にして大地を蘇らせ","color":"#AFAFAF","italic":false}','{"translate":"安寧を齎したが、その後人々はポテトへと変貌を遂げ","color":"#AFAFAF","italic":false}','{"translate":"最後には大地へと還ったと伝えられている。","color":"#AFAFAF","italic":false}','[{"text":"","color":"white","italic":false},{"text":"W","font":"icon","color":"light_purple"},{"text":" サンクチュアリ"}]','{"text":"---TUSBMemory---","obfuscated":true,"color":"gray","italic":false}']},Engraving:{EnchantID:"闇",Tier:2},Skill:{Type:"TUSBMemory",Initializing:1b,Job:"白魔導士",SkillID:418,Name:"サンクチュアリ",Level:1,Interval:300,Trigger:"手に持って右クリック",Count:3}}
